item.title: [PI] Spec d scimi, didn't show the hit while prayer?
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

  1. If someone using prayer, smite or mele or etc… if i spec d scimi with him, the hit didn’t show.
  2. But if he didn’t use prayer, and i speced him with d scimi the hit shows.

How to fix ‘1’ ?? I want to show always

I’ll repp++

Here’s the code for d scimi:

[CODE]case 1: // dragon scimmy special

		if(o.prayerActive[0] || o.prayerActive[1] || o.prayerActive[2] || o.prayerActive[3] || o.prayerActive[4] || o.prayerActive[5] || o.prayerActive[6] || o.prayerActive[7] || o.prayerActive[8] || o.prayerActive[9] || o.prayerActive[10] || o.prayerActive[11] || o.prayerActive[12] || o.prayerActive[13] || o.prayerActive[14] || o.prayerActive[15] || o.prayerActive[16] || o.prayerActive[17] || o.prayerActive[18] || o.prayerActive[19] || o.prayerActive[20] || o.prayerActive[21] || o.prayerActive[22] || o.prayerActive[23] || o.prayerActive[24] || o.prayerActive[25]) {
	o.headIcon = -1;
	for(int p = 0; p < o.PRAYER.length; p++) {
		o.prayerActive[p] = false;
		o.getPA().sendFrame36(o.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		o.stopPrayerDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
		o.getPA().requestUpdates();	
	}
	return;
}
	
	break;[/CODE]

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Spec d scimi, didn't show the hit while prayer?
